product.name: L'Oreal Paris Extra Volume Collagen Mascara
product.description: L'Oreal's biggest volume builder! Introducing the latest innovation in mascara technology--Extra Volume Collagen Mascara. It's made with hydra-collagen and enhances the thickness of your lashes for up to 12x more impact without any clumps. Our patented brush is 50% bigger so it builds that incredible volume fast. Your lashes will build extra body and extra impact in just one sweep.
